brief: We are currently using 3Ds Max to create our perfect room / work space. Then, we will use the library Three.JS. The viewers can move inside the room and interact with different objects. They have to find a secret password and a secret vault. If they have the right combination they can access the vaultâ€™ s treasure.

reflection.text: We have started by listing all of our favorite items and sketching the room. Then we have equally divided the different elements. Then we put all different objects in one file.

We create different use-case and fake clues to mislead the viewer. The vault was given by the teacher but we built a program which declares if the combination is the right one and decides to open the door.
We are currently working on the collisions between the viewers and the objects. We are also working on shadows and colored lights.
